Package com.corochat.app.server.data.repositories

Class UserRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corochat.app.server.data.repositories.UserRepository
  • public class UserRepository
extends java.lang.Object

    The UserRepository object

    The MessageRepository allows to interact with the User table asynchronously

      • UserRepository

        private UserRepository​(UserDao userDao,

        Private constructor that initialize the repository
        Parameters:
        userDao - The user DAO to interact with the database
        executorService - The executor service to submit request asynchronously

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static UserRepository getInstance()
        Singleton design pattern to retrieve the unique instance of the UserRepository
        Returns:
        UserRepository - The unique instance of the user repository

      • getUsers

        public java.util.ArrayList<UserModel> getUsers​(int limit)
        Getter of all the users. Retrieve all the users in the database. If a limit is passed and limit greater than 0, then we limit the response lines
        Parameters:
        limit - The limit can be either 0 or greater than 0
        Returns:
        ArrayList - All or a limited amount of the users contained in the message table

      • getUser

        public UserModel getUser​(java.lang.String email)
        Getter of the user by email. Retrieve the user in the database where its email equals to the given email in parameter.
        Parameters:
        email - The user email
        Returns:
        UserModel - The user corresponding to the email

      • insertUser

        public void insertUser​(UserModel user)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                       java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Insert a message in the database
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - In case of the request is interrupted, it throws it
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - In case of the execution throws an exception, it throws it
